text: (napiye!) Nirakarippavarkalukku nir kuruviraka: Iniyenum avarkal (visamam ceyyatu) vilakik kontal (avarkalutaiya) muntiya kurrankal avarkalukku mannikkappatum. (Avvarillamal visamam ceyyave) mun varuvarkalayin mun cen(ra ivarkal pon)ravarkalin vali erpatte irukkiratu. (Avarkalukku erpatta katitan ivarkalukkum erpatum)
